channel.title: Deleting server java files? this is a way to make my source safe?
channel.description:
if i wanted someone to host my server source would it be safe if i deleted the java files? or can i do something even better?
thanks

item.title: Deleting server java files? this is a way to make my source safe?
item.dc:creator: @i_own_pking i_own_pking
item.description:
@i_own_pking wrote:

[quote=“459 expert, post:2, topic:121136”]if you want someone to host, depending on if you trust them or not, do this.

  1. make a copy of all your server files. (.java and .class)
  2. delete all .java files (leave the .class) (In your copy)
  3. give them the .class files to host. (the copy with just the .class files)[/quote]

Thats just what i said =p

ofcouse i wouldnt delete the files and not have backup, first im c/wing it, ive found a site to do it on =) then if they release i can get them sued.

Read full topic
item.source: Deleting server java files? this is a way to make my source safe?

item.title: Deleting server java files? this is a way to make my source safe?
item.dc:creator: @459_expert 459 expert
item.description:
@459_expert wrote:

if you want someone to host, depending on if you trust them or not, do this.

  1. make a copy of all your server files. (.java and .class)
  2. delete all .java files (leave the .class) (In your copy)
  3. give them the .class files to host. (the copy with just the .class files)
